body.name: HUIJUTCHEN Mini Printer Portable, Bluetooth Pocket Thermal Sticker Printer with 10 Rolls Thermal Paper and Sticker Mini Thermal Printer for iOS & Android Inkless Pocket Printer for Photo Note (White)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 23 hrs 13 mins
features: 【Cute Led Mini Printer】- Our mini portable printer is designed as a cat with two cute little ears. And, the printer body is built with 7 color led lights, when the printer is turned on, the 7 colors will switch in turn, just like a glowing cat. The size of the thermal printer is 3.1 X 3.3 X 1.8in, which can be put into your pocket and used at any time. Great print for pictures, text, tables, emoticons, QR codes, etc.

【Superior Print Quality & with 10 Rolls of Printing Paper】- This thermal printer labels with quality inkless thermal printhead, 200dpi HD printing gives you a clear printing effect, brings you a wonderful printing experience. Mini thermal printer is equipped with 10 rolls of thermal printing paper( 5 x thermal paper + 5 x adhesive thermal paper), meeting your various of need. (Note: The printing effect is black and white, not color. )

【Wireless Bluetooth Connection】- Inkless pocket printer are compatible with IOS and Android, can be easily used through a Bluetooth connection. First, search "Fun Print" on App Store or Google, download and install it in your phone. Then long press the printer button, turn on our smart phone Bluetooth device, open the ❗ "Fun Print"❗ app and click "Connect". Before printing, please check the instructions and follow.

【Perfect Gift】- Mini photo printer is suitable for black and white photos, labels, memos, records, graphics, etc. A cute mini portable printer help you make lists to let your work and study more effectively. Ideal gift for children, students, teachers and family on birthday, Christmas.

【Warming】⚠️If you cannot find the "Fun Print" app, please scan the QR code on the manual to download the app. ⚠️When printing, selecting "Concentration Deep" will make the print clearer!!!⚠️ If the printer does not work, please charge it fully and it will work again.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bluetooth Pocket Thermal Sticker Printer Our portable thermal printer has a unique cat pattern design and emits 7-color led light, making it easy to fall in love with it at first glance. It is a thermal printer that can print labels, pictures, sticky notes, memos and more. It also equipped with 5 roll printer and 5 roll adhesive thermal paper, which is an ideal gift for kids and friends.
The mini thermal printer body is built with 7 colors of LED lights, and when the printer is turned on, the 7 colors will switch sequentially, just like a glowing cat.

This mini sticker printer features a high-quality inkless thermal printhead and 200dpi high-definition printing, giving you a clear printing effect and a wonderful printing experience. Compatible with IOS and Android, it can be easily used through Bluetooth connectivity. You need to search for "Fun Printing" in the App Store or Google to download and install it on your phone. When tearing paper, press the back of the printer with your hand and tear the paper from left to right upward. This will make the paper more complete.

First, download "Fun Printing" from your phone. Second, turn on the Bluetooth function of the phone and make a Bluetooth connection within the "Fun print" application. Then, you can print the content you need. The mini printer body is equipped with 7 colors of LED lights. When the printer is turned on, the 7 colors will be switched in turn. Inkless pocket printer is equipped with 10 rolls of thermal printing paper( 5 x thermal paper + 5 x adhesive thermal paper), meeting your various of need. (Note: The printing effect is black and white, not color. )
The size of the thermal printer is 3.1 X 3.3 X 1.8in, which can be put into your pocket and used at any time. Great print for pictures, text, tables, emoticons, QR codes, etc.
Ideal gift for your friends, child, famliy on the birthday, anniversary, Chirmastic and so on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is soo cool
reviews.reviewText: The sticker printer exceeded my expectations with its vibrant color reproduction and precise printing. Its user-friendly interface and seamless connectivity make it a hassle-free experience. Overall, a reliable choice for quality sticker printing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's a bit bigger than I expected. It has 5 rolls of sticker paper and 5 rolls of receipt paper. App is easy to navigate.Overall fun and nifty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good for the price
reviews.reviewText: The paper is a tad tricky to tear off perfectly, mine keeps pulling out more paper. But nothing some scissors won’t fix! And it’s adorable!! We love the lights!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars CUTE LITTLE GADGET
reviews.reviewText: I got this printer for my 8 year old niece and she is absolutely thrilled printing labels for school and around the room. It comes with an app for download which is easy to use where you connect bluetooth to your phone and print directly from your phone or ipad. It also comes with 10 extra paper rolls! This makes a perfect Christmas gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Gifted this to my 16 year old daughter for Christmas, and she absolutely loved it! She paired it all by herself with no troubles! Design is super cute, easy to pair, and good quality pictures! Recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars App seems really suspicious
reviews.reviewText: I didnt like that the app made u create an account. I did that however and of course it seems sketchy. One feature would only work if it was allowed FULL ACCESS to all my photos and because of that “its a no for me dawg”.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mini Printer Portable
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Because of its small form factor and lightweight construction, it is quite convenient for me to carry it in either my purse or my pocket. This enables me to have it easily accessible whenever the need for printing arises. This printer is constantly by my side, ready to turn digital memories into actual prints. Whether I'm traveling, attending meetings, or just trying to capture special moments, this printer is always there for me. Because it could be connected to a Bluetooth device, putting together the printer was a piece of cake. I just linked it with my iOS smartphone, and the rest of the operation went off without a hitch. Its adaptability is enhanced by the fact that it is compatible with both iOS and Android devices, and this compatibility makes it available to a large number of users. Even those who are not very knowledgeable about technology will have an easy time printing thanks to the user-friendly interface and straightforward software. This tiny thermal printer does not fall short in terms of the quality of the prints that it produces. The prints have a crisp appearance with rich hues and an extraordinary level of detail. It is astonishing how clear and precise the prints come out, regardless of whether I am printing images or papers based on language. Because the thermal printing process does not require the use of ink cartridges, it results in significant cost savings and maintenance that is much simpler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ha sido una verdadera revelación. Su conectividad Bluetooth con iOS y Android es perfecta, además es muy ventajoso que incluye los 10 rollos de papel térmico. La impresión sin tinta es súper conveniente para notas fotográficas sobre la marcha y la portabilidad es impresionante. Me gusta que las luces se encienden mientras está imprimiendo. Esta mini impresora ha añadido un toque de creatividad y practicidad. ¡Recomendada para aquellos que buscan imprimir recuerdos de manera fácil y divertida!

The device is really nice quality and definitely a good value. The app and setup is seamless and took about 30 seconds to download and get printing. It could not be simpler! It’s thermo printing so of course it’s going to be a bit grainy, but it is perfect for photo journaling. After selecting your photo within the app, you can quickly crop and scale very easily. This is a sweet little device and a very fair price for what you get!
This cute little printer is well worth it! My child loves it. Simple to use! Prints nice little stickers!

Very easy to install and to use even for a kid of 5-7 years , just a little comment about the quality of drawing printing , it s a little too much pixelised and too bad that there’s no coulour but kids can couloured them
Cute little printer. Gifted to my 12 and 15 year old girls to print stickers, pics of their friends, etc. Not high quality prints but I didn't expect them to be. Exactly what I expected!

The media could not be loaded. Great portable device. Makes it fun for the kids to tag their stuff. The adhesive on the sticker rolls is strong enough that you can use them on lunch box, water bottles , shoes and bags!!! We also use it around the house to add labels to boxes kitchen items and shelves!! Love the build quality and model, very cute and appealing. The app is so easy to use that even my toddler can operate it with ease!!
